text: Ugadi is a 1997 Telugu romantic film directed by S. V. Krishna Reddy starring himself and Laila in the lead roles. This film is about a middle class young man winning his lady love despite opposition from the girl's father. The music for the film was well received by audiences. ==Cast== * S. V. Krishna Reddy * Laila * Sharat Saxena * Kaikala Satyanarayana * Sudhakar * Tanikella Bharani * Mallikarjuna Rao * Annapoorna * Babu Mohan * Gautam Raju * Bandla Ganesh ==Music track== S. V. Krishna Reddy composed the music for this film. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Song title !! Lyrics !!
